docs.text: written by alex cox , tod davies , terry gilliam and tony grisoni
docs.label: negative

docs.text: directed by terry gilliam
docs.label: negative

docs.text: i've always preferred mushrooms to blotter acid .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: dropping acid is like riding a roller coaster blindfolded ; you have no idea where the peaks and valleys are , no idea when the next terrifying decent will send your stomach into your throat , and no idea how long the ride will last .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: then there's the hard knot in your gut and the clenched teeth that come with ingesting a strychnine-laced dose .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: mushrooms , on the other hand , offer the psychedelic equivalent of a leisurely ride on a ferris wheel : a steady , reassuring assent , a short period of thrilling motion and color , and then a smooth landing .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: acid is for daredevils ; mushrooms are for refined seekers of joy .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: my point is that in fear and loathing in las vegas , director terry gilliam has made an acid movie , when i wish he would have made a mushroom movie .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: full of shocking sight gags , aggressive images and grotesque comic performances , the film certainly offers something for those fans of hunter s . thompson's book who want to experience its twisted pharmacological world-view from the inside out .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: but for those of us who just want to enjoy a well-made film , gilliam has produced a mixed bag .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: fear and loathing tells the ostensibly true story of how self-professed " gonzo " journalist hunter s . thompson ( johnny depp ) and hispanic activist attorney oscar zeta actosta ( benicio del toro ) , came to las vegas to cover a motorcycle race and found themselves trapped in the middle of a district attorney's convention while ingesting every conceivable drug available to a man of means in 1971 .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: operating under the pseudonyms of " raoul duke " and " dr .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: gonzo " , the two men careen into vegas on an acid and mescaline bender , then hole up in a hotel suite to binge on amyl nitrite , cocaine , tequila and a rainbow of multi-colored uppers and downers .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: they terrorize every one they meet , mostly because every one they meet terrifies them .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: duke hallucinates giant bats on the way into town , then is attacked by horrifying lizards in the casino lounge .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: dr . gonzo becomes enamored of a thick-bladed hunting knife and begs duke to throw the tape player into the bathtub with him just as jefferson airplane's " white rabbit " reaches its climax .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: and these guys don't just trash hotel rooms - they rape them , humiliate them and leave them for dead .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: that neither of them ends up dead or in jail is testament to blind luck or providence , depending on your point of view .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: thompson's book , besides being a hilarious read , has stood the test of time as an important historical document .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it simultaneously exposed the 60's drug culture for the sham that it was and exposed las vegas as the place where the american dream came to die .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: pontificate all you want about how the film illustrates thompson's message , but the truth is that , stripped to its bare essentials , what gilliam has wrought is a drug comedy .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it's a cheech and chong movie .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: you're there to watch depp and del toro ingest a lot of chemicals and then laugh at the results : see johnny take drugs , see johnny fall down .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: there's nothing wrong with this concept , but gilliam tries too hard .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: this is a frantic movie - all sweaty close-ups , wide-angle lenses , dutch tilts and other-worldly lighting schemes .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: there are times when gilliam really does put a convincing representation of an acid trip on the screen .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: but to what end ?
docs.label: negative

docs.text: much of the dialogue comes verbatim from thompson's book , and there are some priceless comic observations .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: but you're hard pressed to hear or digest them amidst all the jumbled camera work .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: this brings us to the performances , which strike me as all wrong .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: depp plays thompson as groucho marks filtered through george c . scott in patton - a gimmicky performance which works against the biting satire of thompson's dialogue .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: in between his several puking scenes , del toro fares better as dr . gonzo , but he also mumbles and sputters so many of his lines that their weight is lost .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: watching these two made me wish that the movie had been made twenty years ago , with dan akroyd and john belushi as the leads - now that would have been something to see .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it's interesting to note that alex cox , credited as a co-writer on the screenplay , was originally slated to direct before gilliam took over .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: as much of a fan as i am of gilliam's work , cox would have been the better choice .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: sid and nancy , cox's best work , covered essentially the same subject matter , but cox was able to pull back and allow the characters of sid vicious and nancy spungen to carry the film .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: gilliam commits the compound sin of over-directing his film while being uncertain of his purpose .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: what kind of movie was he trying to make , anyway ?
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it doesn't try to be a cautionary tale , and it doesn't work as broad comedy .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: if he had considered more carefully his purpose , the result would have been a much more interesting film .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: but i don't want to be too hard on it .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: there are some truly funny moments , and if you're in a good enough mood you might get a kick out of it .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: i do , however , recommend watching fear and loathing in las vegas under the influence of your favorite controlled substance - i guarantee it will enhance the effect .
docs.label: negative
